page.title: 10SHOPPING IN SHERBORNE
page.content: Cheap Street, the main street, caters for both locals and tourists. A typical gallery stocks about 40 prints and water colours ranging in price from Â£895 to Â£4. They buy and sell second hand paintings at reason_ able prices. How do they know the paintings and maps are genuine? Its quite easy to find out by the quality of the paper _ they have never had a fake in the gallery yet which is good. The largest department store sells clothes for all ages in a range of prices and styles. Jeans Â£17 - Â£25 Shirts Â£9 - Â£12 Dress Â£14 - Â£200 Jumpers Â£15- Â£40 Shoes Â£10 - Â£35 The back of the building was burnt down in 1980 but was quickly rebuilt. Easy road access to Yeovil enables shoppers to use a large shopping centre if they choose to.
